name: Spider Solitaire Pro!
description:
The best Spider Solitaire game on the app store!

- NO ADS!!
- 40 Beautiful HD Themes
- Quick & Easy Gameplay
- Over 10,000 known winnable games
- 1, 2, 4, suit gameplay
- Portrait & Landscape
- Hints, Auto Moves, Stats, Layout options
- The Pro version has NO ADS!!

If you like Spider Solitaire please rate it 5 stars!
